title: What proportion of people feel their service makes them feel safe?
analysis_commentary: The Care and Support White Paper states that a high-quality service must be one which keeps people safe from harm and it is important that vulnerable groups feel safety from the services social care provides. Service users were asked if they were helped to feel safe specifically by their care and support services. The proportion in 2014-15 is high with almost 85%. Again, the changes to the methodology create a break in the time series in 2014-2015 and comparison to previous years is not possible.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Personal Adult Social Care Survey
